title: spack buildcache list: unexpected failure
body:
Executing the command:
```
spack buildcache list
```
results in an error if mirrors have no `build_cache` subdirectory.

### Expected Result

I would expect something like:
```console
$ spack buildcache list
==> No build caches in "wdir" mirror [/home/mculpo/wdir/spack-mirror]
```

### Actual Result
An error is raised by the command:
```console
$ spack buildcache list
==> Finding buildcaches in /home/mculpo/wdir/wdir-mirror/build_cache
==> Error: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/home/mculpo/wdir/wdir-mirror/build_cache'
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue
Add a mirror without a `build_cache` directory and list build caches:
```console
$ spack mirror add spack mirror add --scope=site wdir file:///home/mculpo/wdir/spack-mirror
$ spack buildcache list
==> Finding buildcaches in /home/mculpo/wdir/spack-mirror/build_cache
==> Error: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/home/mculpo/wdir/spack-mirror/build_cache'
...
```

### Information on your system
Here's my `etc/spack/mirrors.yaml`:
```yaml
mirrors:
  wdir: file:///home/mculpo/wdir/spack-mirror
```
I've seen the error on:
```console
$ uname -a
Linux nuvolari 4.4.0-104-generic #127~14.04.1-Ubuntu SMP Mon Dec 11 12:44:15 UTC 2017 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
```
but I don't think it's architecture specific.
